pLaunchController

Class Knob

  • java.lang.Object
    • pLaunchController.Knob

  • public class Knob
extends java.lang.Object
    A logical representation of the physical knob in the MIDI controller. By rotating a knob, the controller sends a note (values 0-127).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      KNOBS controllerKnob 
      float defaultValue 
      protected java.lang.String variable
      The name of the variable to set when knob changes

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Knob defaultValue(float defaultValue) 
      Knob maxValue(float maxValue)
      Sets the value to be returned when the knob is at its maximum position (127 by default).
      Knob minValue(float minValue)
      Sets the value to be returned when the knob is at its minimum position (0 by default).

      int position() 
      Knob position(int position) 
      Knob range(float minValue, float maxValue)
